channel.title: A big wave can be formed with even the tiniest of ripples.
channel.description: A big wave can be formed with even the tiniest of ripples.

item.title: Hello. I'm Drea.
item.description:
Hello. I'm Drea.

You can't spell DREAM without Drea. I'm an artist, producer, and citizen of the world. I believe beauty can be found everywhere because you can't have light without dark. I'm going show you how beautiful the world can be when you stop and take a look around. But before you can see all the gorgeous things the world has to offer. We need to look inward and find the beauty within ourselves. It was a hard long journey for me to love myself.
